extendedInfo.description: Merry Christmas everyone!!!Santa just came from his home to distribute Christmas gifts to the children of the world...Roads of the world are busy ... But so is Mr. Santa... So you gotta help Santa to cross the roads and reach the destination, but DONOT forget to collect the gifts on your way. More the gifts, happier the childrenInstructions:Touch and hold the Santa and move it on the screen to cross the road. Avoid the traffic and collect the gifts. You need to collect all the red gifts to cross a level Elves can help you get the gifts which are difficult to grab. To collect a gift through an Elf, just click the Elf on top of the screenReindeer can help by giving three additional chances to get the Santa to its destination.

reviews.title: Not sure if I like it. Seems easy
reviews.author: Jami Lam
